source: TEXT_BANKOB305_01368_SEQ_00<tab>The rapidly burgeoning bomb population has 789th Order Dustman Bo Bu concerned for the safety of the tunnels.
target: TEXT_BANKOB305_01368_SEQ_00<tab>第789洞穴団の採掘地のダストマン789 ボ・ブは、阻止したいことがあるようだ。

source: TEXT_BANKOB305_01368_SEQ_01<tab>A foul mess of machinery assembled by alchemists under Zo Ga's influence is belching out boorishly tempered bombs at an alarming rate. Bo Bu, ever eager to please, exhorts you to consult with Ba Go to come up with a means for destroying this hatchery of havoc.
target: TEXT_BANKOB305_01368_SEQ_01<tab>第13洞穴団の手の者によって、<var 28 ((BNpcName)) F209E101 /var>を使ったボム増産が進められているようだ。ダストマン789 ボ・ブから、その阻止を依頼された。<var 28 ((BNpcName)) F209E101 /var>の破壊方法について、第789洞穴団の採掘地の「アコライト789 バ・ゴ」に相談しよう。

source: TEXT_BANKOB305_01368_SEQ_02<tab>Ba Go, welcoming the explosive demise of any bombs other than the beauties fashioned by his own hand, informs you that the bomb incubator is quite easily destroyed and sends you on your way. He does so not without assigning you a task, however: the recovery of a dazzling bomb's glowing arm that he would use to further his research. As said research demands the acolyte's full attention, you are to deliver your findings to Bo Bu.
target: TEXT_BANKOB305_01368_SEQ_02<tab>アコライト789 バ・ゴによると、<var 28 ((BNpcName)) F209E101 /var>は攻撃すれば破壊できるらしい。ウ・ガマロ武装鉱山の「<var 28 ((BNpcName)) F209E101 /var>」を攻撃して破壊しよう。

source: TEXT_BANKOB305_01368_SEQ_03<tab>The incubator falls quickly to your hand, spitting sparks and flames every which way. Search the embers and slay any hostile bombs that have survived the destruction.
target: TEXT_BANKOB305_01368_SEQ_03<tab><var 28 ((BNpcName)) F209E101 /var>を破壊した。付近に飛び散った「<var 28 ((EObj)) F61E92F701 /var>」を調べて「<var 28 ((BNpcName)) F20A9301 /var>」を討伐しよう。

source: TEXT_BANKOB305_01368_SEQ_04<tab>The bombs too have fallen, reducing your immediate surroundings to a blazing inferno that would rival the seventh hell, yet your task is not yet done. Search the embers for the most dazzling bomb of all, slaying it and lopping off its still-glowing arm for the good of science.
target: TEXT_BANKOB305_01368_SEQ_04<tab><var 28 ((BNpcName)) F20A9301 /var>を討伐した。さらに「<var 28 ((EObj)) F61E92F701 /var>」を調べて、現れた「<var 28 ((BNpcName)) F20A9401 /var>」から「<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E894F01 /var>」を入手しよう。

source: TEXT_BANKOB305_01368_SEQ_05<tab>The dazzling bomb's arm is yours, and what an arm it is! Return to the 789th Order Dig with a skip in your step, and entrust it to Dustman Bo Bu, reminding him that Ba Go will come seeking it at a later juncture.
target: TEXT_BANKOB305_01368_SEQ_05<tab><var 28 ((BNpcName)) F20A9401 /var>から<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E894F01 /var>を入手した。第789洞穴団の採掘地の「ダストマン789 ボ・ブ」に「<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E894F01 /var>」を渡そう。

source: TEXT_BANKOB305_01368_SEQ_06<tab>Bo Bu rejoices at the bomb incubator's destruction, while relishing the opportunity to deliver a gift in person to the esteemed Ba Go. The acolyte is a stern taskmaster, but mayhap the young dustman's zeal will earn his respect yet. In the meantime, you can take pride in knowing that your efforts have earned the dig a brief respite from Zo Ga's fiery wrath...
target: TEXT_BANKOB305_01368_SEQ_06<tab>ダストマン789 ボ・ブに<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E894F01 /var>を渡し、<var 28 ((BNpcName)) F209E101 /var>を破壊したことを伝えた。彼は私利私欲のために依頼をしたようだが、結果、フューグルマン13 ゾ・ガの危険な企みを挫けたのは事実。第13洞穴団がボムの量産を再開した際は、また<var 28 ((BNpcName)) F209E101 /var>を止めにいこう。

source: TEXT_BANKOB305_01368_TODO_00<tab>Speak with 789th Order Acolyte Ba Go.
target: TEXT_BANKOB305_01368_TODO_00<tab>アコライト789 バ・ゴと話す

source: TEXT_BANKOB305_01368_TODO_01<tab>Destroy a prototype bomb incubator in U'Ghamaro Mines.
target: TEXT_BANKOB305_01368_TODO_01<tab>ウ・ガマロ武装鉱山の<var 28 ((BNpcName)) F209E101 /var>を破壊

source: TEXT_BANKOB305_01368_TODO_02<tab>Search the embers for the dazzling bomb and slay it to acquire its arm.
target:
TEXT_BANKOB305_01368_TODO_02を調べを2体討伐し
おびき寄せたからを入手

source: TEXT_BANKOB305_01368_TODO_03<tab>Search the embers for the dazzling bomb and slay it to acquire its arm.
target:
TEXT_BANKOB305_01368_TODO_03を調べを2体討伐し
おびき寄せたからを入手

source: TEXT_BANKOB305_01368_TODO_04<tab>Deliver the glowing arm to 789th Order Dustman Bo Bu.
target: TEXT_BANKOB305_01368_TODO_04<tab>ダストマン789 ボ・ブに<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E894F01 /var>を渡す

source: TEXT_BANKOB305_01368_BOBU_000_000<tab>Great, great balls of fire, gas, and smoke! Blast and burst and boom they make, and there is no end, no end to them.
target:
TEXT_BANKOB305_01368_BOBU_000_000なんということであーる！
ウ・ガマロ武装鉱山内に　数多の「」が
設置されているのであーる！

source: TEXT_BANKOB305_01368_BOBU_000_001<tab>Zo Ga's alchemists have built a furnace, yes, a furnace foul. Bombs, bombs, and more bombs it belches forth. Ba Go's bombs are friendly to us─yes, blowing off only the occasional finger. But Zo Ga's creations have tempers foul─cruel, filthy, foul.
target:
TEXT_BANKOB305_01368_BOBU_000_001ボムの増産は　許せないのであーる！
憎き「」を　粉微塵にしてやりたーい！
しかーしワガハイ　壊し方を知らな……ゴホン！

source: TEXT_BANKOB305_01368_BOBU_000_002<tab>I am scared to draw near for fear of losing more than a finger─yes, yes, a paw, an arm, a head. But Ba Go will know what to do. Yes, yes, Ba Go always knows.
target:
TEXT_BANKOB305_01368_BOBU_000_002いやいや　ここはひとーつ
「アコライト789 バ・ゴ」に　花を持たせるのであーる。
アヤーツに　話を聞いてみるのであーる。

source: TEXT_BANKOB305_01368_BOBU_000_003<tab>Zo Ga's fomenting furnace must be destroyed─dispatched, deconstructed, destroyed─but I am scared to draw near. Yes, yes, my limbs I hold too dear. But Ba Go will lead you. Yes, yes, Ba Go will show you the way.
target:
TEXT_BANKOB305_01368_BOBU_000_003「」を　壊すためーに
「アコライト789 バ・ゴ」に　話を聞くのであーる！

source: TEXT_BANKOB305_01368_BAGO_000_010<tab>Not all explosives are created equal─no, no. Ba Go's beauties heave at the sight of Zo Ga's hideous creations─retch, spew, heave. Ba Go's whiskers get singed, yes, they do, and Ba Go loves his beauties even more.
target:
TEXT_BANKOB305_01368_BAGO_000_010ククク……「」の壊し方？
壊すのーは　簡単だーよ？　攻撃すれーば　いいだけだーよ……。

source: TEXT_BANKOB305_01368_BAGO_000_011<tab>You would squelch the ugliness at the source? Be a friend to beauties and to Ba Go? Easily is this done. The furnace needs only a good smashing─a crashing, a thrashing, a smashing.
target:
TEXT_BANKOB305_01368_BAGO_000_011ククク……もし行くなら　お願いがあるーよ。
壊した後　「」を調べるーと
「」が　飛び出てくるのーよ……。

source: TEXT_BANKOB305_01368_BAGO_000_012<tab>But you will be an even greater friend to Ba Go. Yes, you will scour the embers and slay. Scour, scour, and slay you will, until you meet the most dazzling beauty of all. You will take her arm, no questions asked, and deliver it to Bo Bu.
target:
TEXT_BANKOB305_01368_BAGO_000_012その「」を　やっつけーて
さらに「」を　調べまくるーと
「」が　姿を見せーる。

source: TEXT_BANKOB305_01368_BAGO_000_013<tab>Why to Bo Bu, and not to Ba Go? Because Ba Go is busy─occupied, engaged, busy! Bo Bu will hold it for me quietly until I ask, or he will burn, burn, for the bother! Now go, go, and ask no more questions of Ba Go!
target:
TEXT_BANKOB305_01368_BAGO_000_013「」も　始末しーて
「」を　拾うーよ。
嫌がらせついでの　おつかいだと思ってーよ……ククク。

source: TEXT_BANKOB305_01368_BAGO_000_014<tab>After Zo Ga's furnace is no more, you will scour and slay, scour and slay, until you meet the most dazzling beauty of all. You will take her arm, no questions asked, and deliver it to Bo Bu. Why to Bo Bu? Because Ba Go is busy! Now go, and do not question Ba Go!
target:
TEXT_BANKOB305_01368_BAGO_000_014「」を壊しーて　魔物を始末したーら
「」を　拾ってくるーよ。
嫌がらせついでの　おつかいだと思ってーよ……ククク。

source: TEXT_BANKOB305_01368_BOBU_000_030<tab>Many burstings and blastings Bo Bu heard. Is Zo Ga's bomb-belching furnace no more?
target:
TEXT_BANKOB305_01368_BOBU_000_030首尾は　どうであーる？
「」を　破壊できたのであるーか？

source: TEXT_BANKOB305_01368_BOBU_000_031<tab>A sign of success─triumph, victory, success? Yes, less bombs a<var 1F /var>blasting pleases Bo Bu, pleases us all─hm?
target:
TEXT_BANKOB305_01368_BOBU_000_031さすがーは　オヌーシ！
この「」は　ワガハイが責任もって
バ・ゴに渡しておくであーる。

source: TEXT_BANKOB305_01368_BOBU_000_032<tab>A present you would entrust to me, meant for Ba Go? Oh, you are kind, yes, kind indeed!
target:
TEXT_BANKOB305_01368_BOBU_000_032フフフ……これーで　ゾ・ガの野望も　一歩後退！
ボムの増産などされてーは　アヤーツの評価が上がってしまーう！
それだけーは　見過ごせないことなのであーる！！

source: TEXT_BANKOB305_01368_BOBU_000_033<tab>I will deliver it to our resident genius straightaway, with speed, yes, all speed. “Bo Bu, your loyalty is laudable─commendable, praiseworthy, laudable. Gladly, yes, gladly, will Ba Go take you as his apprentice.” Yes, yes, Bo Bu can hear his words now!
target:
TEXT_BANKOB305_01368_BOBU_000_033ザマぁ見ろなのであーる！
コボルド族の頂点に立つーに　相応しいのはこのワガハイ！
ゾ・ガなどでーは　ないのであーる！

source: TEXT_BANKOB305_01368_POPMESSAGE_000_000<tab>A blinding globe of fire bursts from the flames!
TEXT_BANKOB305_01368_POPMESSAGE_000_001<tab>There is a rush of heat from among the embers!

target: TEXT_BANKOB305_01368_POPMESSAGE_000_002<tab> その行動は出現した敵を倒さないと実行できません
